non_security_other_patches.description: Number of other currently available patches that are not related to security.

security_critical.description: Number of currently available critical security patches.

security_important.description: Number of currently available security patches classified as important.

security_low.description: Number of currently available security patches classified as low importance.

security_moderate.description: Number of currently available security patches classified as moderate importance.

security_not_classified.description: Number of security patches that do not have a severity classification.

service_pack.description: Number of currently available service packs.

total_supported_devices.description: Total number of devices that support Patch Management.
